definitions.title: n.pr.m. et gent.
definitions.body: Israel (Ēl persisteth, persevereth (or juss. Let Ēl persist) [usu. contendeth (Nes:Eg. 60 ff.) or Let Ēl contend (Gray:Prop. N. 218), but v. Dr:Hast. DB JACOB 530]; on vocalization v. Lag:BN 131 f. Kit:1Ch 4:16 (Hpt); MI:5, + 5 t. [[ישראל]]; in Egypt. Y-si-r-’l Steindorff:ZAW xvi (1896), 331, cf. Breasted:Bib. World ix (1897), 62 ff. Paton:Syr. and Pal. 134; As. Sir-’-lai (= [[יִשְׂרְאֵלִי]]) Schr:KG 356 ff., 364; COT Ge 36:31, 1Ki 16:29.—On a poss. relation of ´[[יִשׂ]]: to n.pr. [[שָׂרַי]], [[שָׂרָה]] v. RS:K 257, 2nd ed. 34;—cf. ([[וּ]])[[שְׂרָיׇה]];—Israhl:

definitions.title: 1. n.pr.m.
definitions.body: second name of Jacob Ge 32:29 + 28 t. Gn (JE), Ex 32:13 (JE), Ho 12:13, Ju Jdg 18:29, Ex 6:14, Nu 1:20, Nu 26:5 (all P), 2Ki 17:34, 1Ch 1:34 + 8 t. Chr, Ps 105:23; ´[[בֵּית יִשׂ]]: Ru 4:11; ´[[בְּנֵי יִשׂ]]: (lit.) Ge 42:5 + 3 t. E, 2 t. P + Ex 1:7 (P; transition to wider use), 1Ki 18:31, 1Ch 2:1 +; = 12 tribes Ex 28:9 + 7 t. P; ´[[אֱלֽהֵי אַבְרָהָם יִחְחָק וְיִשׂ]]: † 1Ki 18:36, 1Ch 29:18, 2Ch 30:6.

definitions.title: f.
definitions.body: 1Sa 17:21, 2Sa 24:9 [not ‖ 1Ch 21:5], cf. Dr:ad loc. Albr:ZAW xvi (1896), 57 f.): name of Hebrew nation; usu. der. from
but ´[[יִשׂ]]: more common in early usage than ´[[בְּנֵי יִשׂ]]: (v. [[בֵּן]] p. 120:b):

definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: (1) undivided kingdom; ´[[יִשׂ]]: Ge 47:27 (J), Ge 49:7 (poem in J) + 108 t. JE, De 1:1, De 18:6, De 33:10 (poem) + 76 t. D, Ge 34:7, Ex 12:15 + 42 t. P; Ju Jdg 5:2, Jdg 5:7, Jdg 5:7 + 104 t. Ju, oft. 1 and 2 Sm, 1Ki 1-12; ´[[כָּל־יִשׂ]]: of whole people 2Sa 8:15 +, of whole army 2Sa 11:1 +, opp. Judah 2Sa 2:9 + (so also later). (2) ´[[יִשׂ]]: = N. tribes, disting. fr. Judah, even before disruption, 2Sa 2:9, cf. v:2Sa 2:10, 2Sa 3:10, 2Sa 4:1, 2Sa 5:5, 2Sa 12:7, 2Sa 20:1, 1Ki 1:35, 1Ki 4:20, 1Ki 5:5 +; so at disruption 1Ki 12:16, 1Ki 12:16, 1Ki 12:16, 1Ki 12:18, 1Ki 12:19; then usu. of N. kingdom, till its fal, v:1Ki 12:28, 1Ki 24:7, 24:10 + very oft. K, Am 1:1, Am 2:6, Am 3:14 +, Ho 1:5, Ho 4:15, Ho 4:15, Ho 5:3, Ho 5:3, Ho 5:5 +, Mic 1:13, etc. (3) ´[[יִשׂ]]: of S. kingdom, Judah, rarely bef. fall of Samaria Is 1:3, Is 8:18, Mic 1:14, Mic 1:15, so ´[[בְּנֵי יִשׂ]]: 1Ki 12:17; after fall of Sam., ´[[יִשׂ]]: (less oft. ´[[בְּנֵי יִשׂ]]:) occurs of entire people, in reference to past or future 2Ki 21:8, 2Ki 23:22, Is 17:9, Ps 103:7, Je 2:3, Je 50:17, Je 50:19 +; ´[[יִשׂ]]: also = Judah Je 2:14, Je 2:31, Je 4:1 +, Ez Eze 13:2, Eze 13:4, Eze 13:16, Eze 14:1, Eze 14:7, Eze 14:9 +, Is 40:27, Is 41:8, Is 42:24 +, Ezr 2:59 = Ne 7:61, Ezr 2:70, Ezr 3:11 +, Ne 10:34, Ne 10:3 +, Ps 14:7, Ps 14:7 = Ps 53:6, Ps 53:6, Ps 147:2, Ps 149:2 +, etc. (4) usage in Chr: ´[[יִשׂ]]: of whole people 1Ch 2:7 + 110 t., of N. kingdom 2Ch 11:1 + 16 t., of Judah 2Ch 12:6, 2Ch 19:8 + 9 t. (5) ´[[יִשׂ]]: personif. as ´[[עֶבֶד י]]:, Is 44:1, Is 44:21, Is 49:3.

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: ´[[בְּנֵי יִשׂ]]:, (1) of undiv. people Ex 1:12 (J), Ex 3:9 (E) + 72 t. JE, De 3:18, De 10:6 + 25 t. D, Ge 32:33 + 327 t. P; Ju Jdg 1:1 + 60 t. Ju; seld. 1 and 2 Sm, 1Ki 1-12; in 1Ki 13-2Ki 25 pass. in ref. to older hist. (rarely otherwise). (2) seldom of N. kingdom Am 2:11 + 9 t. Am Ho, 2Ch 13:12 + 7 t. Chr. (3) of Judah (late) Ez Eze 2:3, Ne 1:6, Ne 1:6, Ezr 3:1, Joe 4:16 +, 2Ch 31:5.
